title: AntKB
author: AntKB
content: The Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.British Horse Racing - Using Video Game Display - Tells The Winner of a Real Horse Race  During a Race.The Video Display and Secret Technique gives the winner of the race before the race finishes -100 % correct cheat code in game. Displays code for 5 seconds (for a real horse race via the video game monitor, which means you have to be fast to place a bet before odds dissappear.)My Profile: Genius Work Profile:www.ideaconnection.com/innovative-people/horatio-baugh/ Payment:1. PayPal : www.paypal.me/developerme2. Payment via auction3. Crypto Currency - Bitcoin: Wallet Address below.35Nnjh3RNdWzF594FWQxafsEiRFWyfDE1h4. Bank Transfer5. Cheque6. Might be willing to exchange for luxury watches, gold bars, etc.Refunds:Will not accept refunds however, willing to work out issues with buyer.Pictures:1 image below via Google Photos.https://photos.app.[Suspicious link removed]/HoMzHP8jckLBtevJ9Responses from Me:Due to potential time differences between times please allow within 3 hours for a reply.DM Me.Thanks.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.OP can you explain what you meant by the above quotedYou really have not given any hint of your services here and possible outcome of it but you are quite fast to drop payments option for  potential customers to make payment without without proper idea of what they want to pay for.However, the link you dropped there claiming it to be your profile is not convincing and does not look genuine.Lastly, do you not have portfolio and with the nature of your offer, why not have option for escrow because one must be sure of their end results before any payment be done as there are lots of scams and scammers with this gimmicks all over the internet space.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: First I want to ask you.You refuse a refund, whereas your account is newbie here without any reputation and you also don't use escrow to avoid fraud.Then, what if someone buys your cheat code but it turns out that it can't be used exactly as you said? Solving the buyer's problem while you don't have any evidence here.I don't suspect you of being a fraud but please provide details of understanding or any evidence we can see as you say.

comments.author: AntKB
comments.body: Hello Kind of you to reply with optimism..What I hope is that we could arrive at a compromise.Perhaps, a good faith scenario would be to offer a refund minus 10% fee for my reveal of my code or something similar.If you have suggestions please do mention with earnest!

comments.author: AntKB
comments.body: Hello, Eager to respond.£30,000 cost price for emailed product If you bear with me I aim to structure an in-depth response tomorrow. I have work to attend to tomorrow and may be more alert to respond to you then, due to long working day today. Nevertheless, I work at IdeaConnection.com (Solving Fortune 500 Companies problems for high numeration...)Thanks for your understanding. Without a doubt, I will reply tomorrow, thus good night.Quote from: CryptSafe on March 29, 2023, 05:19:53 PMQuote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.OP can you explain what you meant by the above quotedYou really have not given any hint of your services here and possible outcome of it but you are quite fast to drop payments option for  potential customers to make payment without without proper idea of what they want to pay for.However, the link you dropped there claiming it to be your profile is not convincing and does not look genuine.Lastly, do you not have portfolio and with the nature of your offer, why not have option for escrow because one must be sure of their end results before any payment be done as there are lots of scams and scammers with this gimmicks all over the internet space.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 07:22:14 PMHello Perhaps, a good faith scenario would be to offer a refund minus 10% fee for my reveal of my code or something similar.Honestly, OP this is hard to understand what you really pushing at and to me it's not far from the kind of scam threads we have had in recent times. You talked about you being paid for giving out a some code which payment isn't refundable in anyway, and now you have gone down to 10% payment for just a revealing of the code. I still think you need to explain more and give more evidence to prove how credible your idea is.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.British Horse Racing - Using Video Game Display - Tells The Winner of a Real Horse Race  During a Race.The Video Display and Secret Technique gives the winner of the race before the race finishes -100 % correct cheat code in game. Displays code for 5 seconds (for a real horse race via the video game monitor, which means you have to be fast to place a bet before odds dissappear.)I don't understand what could we do with those informations because bets on horse racing are usually closed before the start of the races. So where we would be able to place our bets, even if your tips are reliable and accurate? There are bookmakers allowing live bets on those races, really? Could you name them here please, because it's the first I hear about that.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.British Horse Racing - Using Video Game Display - Tells The Winner of a Real Horse Race  During a Race.The Video Display and Secret Technique gives the winner of the race before the race finishes -100 % correct cheat code in game. Displays code for 5 seconds (for a real horse race via the video game monitor, which means you have to be fast to place a bet before odds dissappear.)^Interesting! Then if this is profitable then why not just bet on your own and win the race using your own reliable tips?If it has a 100% accurate cheat code game, you can benefit it yourself without other funds, it seems I smell fishy here which I think could be clearly a scam. We should be careful of this and probably people here already this kind of trick.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: DoublerHunter on March 29, 2023, 10:06:33 PMQuote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.British Horse Racing - Using Video Game Display - Tells The Winner of a Real Horse Race  During a Race.The Video Display and Secret Technique gives the winner of the race before the race finishes -100 % correct cheat code in game. Displays code for 5 seconds (for a real horse race via the video game monitor, which means you have to be fast to place a bet before odds dissappear.)^Interesting! Then if this is profitable then why not just bet on your own and win the race using your own reliable tips?If it has a 100% accurate cheat code game, you can benefit it yourself without other funds, it seems I smell fishy here which I think could be clearly a scam. We should be careful of this and probably people here already this kind of trick. Yeah, doesn't make sense for the OP to share his secret techniques hehehe, and so mostly likely it's either not going to work and it's going to be a scam. So for me, nah, not going to bite on this so called prediction with 100% accuracy to win. It's obvious cheating for me and if it is found out by the gambling platform then your money is gone for sure. So just be careful for those who might fall for this trick, just saying. There's no such thing as an accurate prediction. If there is, many could have been millionaires by now.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.British Horse Racing - Using Video Game Display - Tells The Winner of a Real Horse Race  During a Race.The Video Display and Secret Technique gives the winner of the race before the race finishes -Lolz, I must say that this is really interesting..If this is really worth 30,000 dollars, it sure means that it works, but unfortunately, there is absolutely no way to verify.If this actually works, don't you think it would be a good idea to show us your betting history, along with a way of verifying that the information contained in there is genuine?Piece of advice -If this actually works, and it's really worth the amount you mentioned, I will suggest you start by selling to family and friends, people who are in contact with you in person, start by building reputation from there, don't come here and advertise sh**t and expect users to believe you..For all I care, this looks clearly like a scam..

comments.author: AntKB
comments.body: I'm still in work, however on my break I traded / bet on three separate races and took all three spots, won outright. Each time. Some were 1,2,3 others were 1,2,3,4 places. I only bet the equivalent to the number of each places available e.g. 3 places available I traded 3 individual bets in that race and again the result was I took all 3 places. Repeated this for THREE CONSECUTIVE RACES! I aim to post the trading results.If I'm free at 2pm GMT Time.HoratioP.S. I today hacked a new code to win the above races. Note: I could have in total 4 hacks to win races.I'm willing to respond to replies after 2pm GMT Time.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: 30 thousand pounds? Lol. What is this cheat code? So basically OP has some magical method, which can be used to predict the outcome of horse races? Really? Aren't the horse races rigged?If something sounds too good to be true, then it most likely is. The price of 30K GBR is ridiculous. OP has balls of steel. I can bet 100K that nobody is going to sacrifice his life savings to spend 30K GBR for a "cheat code". Not even the most hardcore horse racing gamblers. Good luck with finding customers, OP...

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on March 30, 2023, 10:37:59 AMI'm still in work, however on my break I traded / bet on three separate races and took all three spots, won outright. Each time. Some were 1,2,3 others were 1,2,3,4 places. I only bet the equivalent to the number of each places available e.g. 3 places available I traded 3 individual bets in that race and again the result was I took all 3 places. Repeated this for THREE CONSECUTIVE RACES! I aim to post the trading results.If I'm free at 2pm GMT Time.HoratioP.S. I today hacked a new code to win the above races. Note: I could have in total 4 hacks to win races.I'm willing to respond to replies after 2pm GMT Time.OP,  I would assume this to be a fiction not until proven otherwise by you if not how do you explain this story you are telling and demanding for a €30,000 fee for a cheat code for horse racing. I wonder if you are a seer or is there something you are not telling us so, if there is, tell us so atleast the others can have a bit confidence in your offer even if they would find it difficult to patronize you but atleast they could be able to remember or refference you to others who might likely need your services and lastly, with the amount involved in your fee, I do not think anyone would want to take that risk of paying directly to you not when there is no guarantee of the game they are about playing and come to talk of it, just like the previous reply, you are a new bie here with no reputation or trust level so tell me who would take such risk with the amount involved as you have clearly stated.

comments.author: AntKB
comments.body: Hi, I'm happy to talk to you about my systems. How does it work here in this forum? DM me if possible private message. By the way, about the price I could accommodate you I'm sure, be it £30k or £your budget. Thanks. comments.author: Hirose UK
comments.body: Quote from: DoublerHunter on March 29, 2023, 10:06:33 PMQuote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.British Horse Racing - Using Video Game Display - Tells The Winner of a Real Horse Race  During a Race.The Video Display and Secret Technique gives the winner of the race before the race finishes -100 % correct cheat code in game. Displays code for 5 seconds (for a real horse race via the video game monitor, which means you have to be fast to place a bet before odds dissappear.)^Interesting! Then if this is profitable then why not just bet on your own and win the race using your own reliable tips?If it has a 100% accurate cheat code game, you can benefit it yourself without other funds, it seems I smell fishy here which I think could be clearly a scam. We should be careful of this and probably people here already this kind of trick. Now this is what I think is why he doesn't make his own bets with predictions that he says are quite accurate and he can get a bigger profit if he bets alone.Surprisingly not only the op in this thread but there are also several other members who create threads like this by offering predictions on various types of bets.We don't know whether these kind of bidding threads are accurate and trustworthy or not or just making offers for the purpose of seeking personal gain by exploiting gamblers who want to pay for their predictions.We must continue to warn all gamblers to be careful of offering predictions of this kind.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.created_time: March 30, 2023, 06:03:13 PMLast edit: March 30, 2023, 08:26:06 PM by bitbollo
comments.body: 30K for a sure system to win horse betting ?  I am really surprised that people are listening such bull shit and giving credit to a clear scam. Anyone that has played on this sport know very well that is clearly impossible but ok, it seems that newbies have always some secret system for everything

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on March 29, 2023, 05:19:53 PMQuote from: AntKB on March 29, 2023, 02:53:02 PMThe Digital Price: £30,000.00. Negotiable.OP can you explain what you meant by the above quotedYou really have not given any hint of your services here and possible outcome of it but you are quite fast to drop payments option for  potential customers to make payment without without proper idea of what they want to pay for.Simply he is asking just huge amount of money for a tool that will give you video display that shows advance result of the specific horse racing result since there’s a delay broadcast which sportsbook usually late to update their odds on a few seconds. Although this is possible but I doubt that someone can really developed a tool that can capitalized on that small time window for delay.This 30K pound price is so expensive for a shady service like this. Even if this is a legit service, Paying that huge amount is very risky since he is just selling the tool publicly that will be soon confiscated.I smell scam few miles away with this kind of service offered here in gambling section.

comments.author: dezoel
comments.body: Things are obviously not clear about OP and what he is trying to sell, I know he has mentioned that it is a kind of video game screen or display that reveals the winner of a real horse race before the game finishes, but other than that, nothing is really clear and understandable. I also don't get why he has mentioned a profile from a website where he might be working or something.@OP, it might not be a good idea to give out your account names and addresses, etc. You should keep that confidential and only share it with someone privately if you get to have a deal with someone.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: dezoel on March 30, 2023, 07:02:48 PMThings are obviously not clear about OP and what he is trying to sell, I know he has mentioned that it is a kind of video game screen or display that reveals the winner of a real horse race before the game finishes, but other than that, nothing is really clear and understandable. I also don't get why he has mentioned a profile from a website where he might be working or something.@OP, it might not be a good idea to give out your account names and addresses, etc. You should keep that confidential and only share it with someone privately if you get to have a deal with someone.For all I know, the profile he shared here could be fake, so I personally can not count that as anything, or reason to trust the Op.If at all he(op) wants to prove his legitimacy, the best thing to do would be to offer this service for free to some users here, to give it a try, if it works out perfectly, then I believe several users will buy into this service, but not at this asking price, as i personally consider it too expensive - though it largely depends on the odds.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: you need to be direct, what are you really offering here?are you offering horse racing prediction service?are you charging 30,000$ for your services or do people have to have 30,000$ to bet? and how much exactly will your services cost? let's be honest: do you really believe that in this forum people would give you 30,000$? such a high value and for an unknown person? why did you choose 30,000$?Can you post your predictions for people to see? Also if you're a genius guy at forecasting why do you need other people's money? wouldn't it be easier for you to take your money (you could borrow money from your friends, relatives or bank) and gamble? Tell me why you're not rich yet? it doesn't make any sense that a guy who can do horse racing predictions well needs other people's money
